review: while we were traveling my son had vomiting and severe stomach ache...I booked an appointment and got a call on time. I explained the symptoms to doctor and she prescribed medicines which worked perfectly. Thanks to doctor.
Dr. Sheetal carefully understood and very friendly explained us about the situation and treatment. Thanks Dr.
Doctor was very patient and helped answer all our queries.  She took time to listen and documented the concerns and then addressed them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After thorough checkup..Doctor helped us understand the condition and clearly provided the prescription with explaination.
Dr Sheetal explained very well on the vaccinations to be given to our baby and also guided us on feeding our baby. Very happy with the consultation. Thank you Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was very friendly and explained the problem, treatment, diet chart very clearly.  I would definitely recommend her.

*** *** *** **** ******** *** ***** ****** *** gave us good suggestion for Child vaccination....she has wide range of vaccines from Rs400-9000.she suggested us to go for painful as it would give longer immunity vs painless....and painless being 4 times more the price

I had contacted this doctor for my 3 months baby diaheria issues. She treated very well in manner and answered all my questions very calmly and suggested for good medications without antibiotic & probiotic medications. I & my are really happy for the doctor consultation and we recomend this doctor for your babies. Once, again thank u ma'am for your consultation.

We booked appointment through practo and went around 9kms to see the doctor for my 5 yr old kid not being well. Moment we reached, the lady in reception was not very courteous, she said doctor asked to you go to her residence, I will write down the address and you go there. We felt very bad and refused to go to her house

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sheetal is my Kids favourite Doctor.  She is such a friendly and have lots of patience to listen to all our problems. Her medicines have always worked so well for my kids. The most importantly she is always available. I am very happy with her treatment.
